WorkItem.Description:
It would be interested what is the best way to
 
o provide search capabilities for most common file and data types—such as e-mail, media files, contacts, calendar appointments, documents, and other third-party formats. The system's search capabilities can be extended in a number of ways.
 
o provide fast search capabilities within third-party applications, such as a search box placed directly within the application frame or window.
 
This is a request which concerns nearly all SmartClient applications as the would like to provide fast search capabilities. It would be very helpful a good full sample using Windows Search SDK-API in .NET application. 
 
Windows Search 4.0 for Developers
http://www.microsoft.com/windows/products/winfamily/desktopsearch/choose/windowssearch4/developers.mspx
 
 
Thank you in advance
WorkItem.Summary: [Code Sample request] Using Windows Search 4.0 API in .NET
